original_title: 狂った性欲者　主婦を襲う！
overview: Tetsuro Moriyama, 29 years old. He was sentenced to 3 years and 6 months in prison for raping a woman and released on parole after 2 years and 3 months. However, it was not easy to find a job. One day, he was on his way to an interview at a transportation company. Along the way, he meets a married woman named Reiko...
title: Kurutta seiyoku-sha: Shufu o osou!
